name: Arc'teryx Gamma LT Pants - Women's
description: Climbing tomorrow, hiking with friends next weekend, dream backpacking trip in a few months... playing outdoors can get complicated. Simplify things a bit with these versatile soft shell pants. Tough, lightweight and beautifully constructed, the Gamma LT pants have you covered for a wide range of activities. They're cut to accommodate dynamic movements, with a women's specific design and plenty of stretch. The fit is close to the body with a straight leg, with a low profile brushed-back waistband that lies comfortably under a pack and feels great against your skin. Drawstring adjustable cuffs can be tightened to keep out bugs and trail debris, or hiked up out of the way for climbing.Face fabric is lightweight, durable and DWR-treated for water resistance.Women's specific design, with a sleek fit that's close to the body.Soft, brushed polyester-lined waist has a snap closure and integrated adjustable webbing belt.Zip fly.2 mesh-lined hand pockets with laminated zip closure.Thigh pocket with laminated zip.Gusseted crotch, articulated knees and stretch for freedom of movement.Straight leg.Laminated cuffs with adjustable drawcord.Reflective logo.
